text: HRary 74y RTHNf gfeasrot (7345 4Rae- & RTTAFf 4AT4, HRT TRrTT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) & *n vfl-5 & 6, {az7-10, ERa5;, #f faarit 110 075 0 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T9/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Environment/ 2022 Policy Circular No.7.4.7/2022 dated July, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/ Modified Schedules for Plantation/2022 (Comp.No. 143718)} Sub: Specification for Avenue and Median Plantations The   Government has promulgated Green Highways   (Plantation,  Transplantation, Beautification and Maintenance) Policy-2015 to enhance the aesthetics of highways and IRC guidelines to regulate the plantation activities and post planting operations. In view of road safety concerns and conflicting provisions in different IRC guidelines, NHAI decided to tweak the provisions in all upcoming Concessionaire Agreement to ensure effective planning, implementation, monitoring and maintenance of plantation works as a part of construction   projects. Moreover there are some discrepancies between the provisions of IRC-SP:21 and Manual of specification & standards for 2/4/6 laning which call for clarification_ Accordingly, the Plantation and  landscaping  related prescriptions in Schedule C and Schedule D of RFP and CA should be as follows: Schedule-C The planting of number of treeslshrubs in avenue and median including their maintenance will be guided by the IRC-SP:21 provisions subject to the availability of ROW making allowance for recovery area: (2) Schedule-D The provision of IRC-SP:21 are to be followed except that the first row of Avenue plantation should be 14m away from the centre line of the extreme traffic lane to allow recovery area for road safety concerns. Following guidelines are be adhered to: Site Preparation (Clause 11.14 of IRC-SP:21) a. Digging of pits as per standard_pit size %f 60 X 60 X 60 cm. b. Filling Farm Yard manure and Fertile Soil (ii)   Planting of Saplings a. Detailed information provided in IRC-SP:21 (iii) Post-Planting Operations (Clause 11.20 of IRC-SP:21) a.
